title: Sir Cliff Richard's Cancer Story
summary: Sir Cliff Richard, a famous singer, has shared that he had prostate cancer. He is 85 years old and found out about the cancer during a check-up for a tour. The cancer was caught early and had not spread to other parts of his body, so he got treatment and it is gone now. He wants to help other men by encouraging them to get tested for cancer early. He thinks it is important for men to talk about health and not be afraid. Sir Cliff hopes to work with the King to make testing easier for everyone. He believes that early checks can save lives and that the government should listen to people who want better screening.

background_read: Prostate cancer is a disease that affects men, especially as they get older. It happens in a part of the body called the prostate. Early detection through tests like check-ups can help find cancer before it spreads, making treatment easier. Sir Cliff Richard is a well-known singer from the UK who has had many hit songs. He is sharing his story to raise awareness about the importance of health checks for men, encouraging them to talk about their health and get tested to catch problems early.
Article_Structure: WHO: Sir Cliff Richard, an 85-year-old singer
WHAT: He had prostate cancer that was caught early and treated, and he wants to promote cancer screening for men
WHERE: He found out during a check-up for a tour to Australia and New Zealand
WHY: To encourage men to get tested early and work with the King to improve screening programs

perspectives.description: Sir Cliff believes men should talk about health and get regular tests to prevent cancer deaths.
